*|Doctor Evidence-Sanofi Post-training email|*
Dear {!Contact.Name},
Thank you for attending our basic training session. Below, please find a copy of the DOC Search Quick Start Guide and the Introductory Training Slides used during the training session.
You now have access to the Doctor Evidence DOC Library and DOC Data packages for Cardiovascular, Diabetes, Immunology, Multiple Sclerosis and Established Medicines (including Consumer Health). A Single-sign on (SSO) system will allow you to use your existing Sanofi credentials to login to the Doctor Evidence Platform--including DOC Search--by navigating to: https://sanofi.doctorevidence.com/
You are invited to attend an upcoming DOC Search training, where you will learn how to conduct a Rapid Assessment on the most up-to-date literature. Please respond to this email if you are interested in attending any of the following sessions: 12 December 2017 | 10-10:45 AM EST | 4-4:45 PM CET | 14 December 2017| 10-10:45 AM EST | 4-4:45 PM CET | 9 January 2018| 10-10:45 AM EST | 4-4:45 PM CET | 23 January 2018| 10-10:45 AM EST | 4-4:45 PM CET |
We value your feedback, so please take a few minutes to complete brief survey. On behalf of the Doctor Evidence Team, we are looking forward to a fruitful collaboration.
Thank You,
Nancy Morgan Director of Learning and Development Doctor Evidence 301 Arizona Ave Suite 301 Santa Monica CA 90401 847-507-1451
